Package org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.simulation.core

Class SimulationDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.simulation.core.SimulationDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation, SimulationScheduling
    public class SimulationDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simulation, SimulationScheduling
    The SimulationDriver simulates and executes the registered behaviors and its interceptors. It holds a list of DecoratedSimulationBehaviorProvider and their corresponding SimulationBehavioExtension and puts them into the eventBus. The EventBus is provided by a SimulationEngine.
    Author:
    Julijan Katic

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init​(org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.module.models.ModelModule modelInjector)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Initialize the simulation with an Injector that is provided by the workflow for module injectors. This should be called before the simulation starts (Simulation.startSimulation()). The behavior is unknown if this method is called after the simulation has already started.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Simulation
        Parameters:
        modelInjector - The injector with modules that can provide the models (and different data) needed during the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Starts the simulation. Should only be called after Simulation.init(SimulationModel).
        Specified by:
        startSimulation in interface Simulation
